ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Praised....
ygData.msgSnippet: Grrr, they don t do /randoms on the Yak on E ci, they run a list...I ve camped that room a grand total of about 20 hours now and still no luck, I ll never get
ygData.messageBody:
Grrr, they don't do /randoms on the Yak on E'ci, they run a list...I've
camped that room a grand total of about 20 hours now and still no luck, I'll
never get one :-(

People tell me to buy or trade for it, but 8000-10000pp worth of coin or
trade items is simply not anything I am anywhere near having access to, ahh
well.

Congrats!

Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2000 5:20 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Praised....
>
>
> From: John_Senior@...
>
> Last night my friend and I managed to get invited into the
> Lord group. When
> we arrived the group was killing 2 boks, after they were dead
> 2 people left
> and we replaced them. 10 minutes after joining the Lord
> spawned with a Yak
> and we killed him. I won the roll with a 52 =P
>
> The next time round we had 2 boks spawn and being only level
> 40 I was a bit
> dubious as to whether Kelins Lugubrious Lament would be resisted. Our
> warrior was gonna pull them both but I said wait. Told the
> cleric to get
> ready to heal me big time, I then attempted the Lament on the
> right bok. It
> stuck, I turned round and chained the left bok and he came
> solo. The group
> was impressed and I got comments like wow, great pull mad,
> excellent work
> and bards are great. I was pleased to see comments like this
> as I often
> feel that bards are only regarded as crack dealers. It's good
> to let other
> people see the value of bards in a group over than mana song.
>
> Anyway, pulling the 1 bok enable us to break the spawn and made life
> easier, shortly after we finished the 2nd bok another Lord
> with the Yak
> spawned (I didn't roll). All in all a good night, got a Yak
> and a Burlupp
> sack and am less than a bubble to level 41.
>
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 40 Songs <Guardians of Light>
> Veeshan Server
>
>
>
